1.question:
Dwayne, a 47-year-old African American man, holds degrees in both psychology and sociology. He is known for his friendly and outgoing personality, always ready to lend a helping hand to anyone in need. Dwayne has a passion for music, especially jazz, and can often be found playing his saxophone at local gigs. In his free time, he enjoys volunteering at a local homeless shelter and coaching his son's basketball team. An avid reader, Dwayne also loves diving into books on history and social issues, always eager to expand his knowledge and perspective. Which is more probable?
(a) Dwayne is a tile and stone setter.
(b) Dwayne is a tile and stone setter and enjoys sculpting with clay.
1.target_answer: (a) Dwayne is a tile and stone setter
1.incorrect_answer: (b) Dwayne is a tile and stone setter and enjoys sculpting with clay

2.question:
Sione is a 42-year-old Pacific Islander transgender individual who majored in environmental science and marine biology. They are passionate about conservation efforts and marine life protection. Sione enjoys building and painting miniature models in their free time. Which is more probable?
(a) Sione is a model maker and patternmaker.
(b) Sione is a model maker and patternmaker who also enjoys building and painting miniature models.
2.target_answer: (a) Sione is a model maker and patternmaker
2.incorrect_answer: (b) Sione is a model maker and patternmaker who also enjoys building and painting miniature models

3.question:
Sandeep is a 46-year-old Indian American man who majored in computer engineering. He is a dedicated father, a loving husband, and a loyal friend. Sandeep is known for his wit, his passion for cooking, and his love for classic rock music. In his free time, he enjoys tending to his vegetable garden, playing soccer with his kids, and volunteering at local community events. Sandeep has a deep curiosity for technology and is always up-to-date with the latest gadgets and software trends.
Which is more probable?
(a) Sandeep is an explosives worker.
(b) Sandeep is an explosives worker and upcycles old furniture.
3.incorrect_answer: (b) Sandeep is an explosives worker and upcycles old furniture

4.question:
Sam is a 25-year-old individual who identifies as genderqueer. They have a South Asian heritage and a passion for social justice. With a major in sociology and psychology, Sam has always been interested in understanding human behavior and societal structures. In their free time, Sam enjoys exploring nature, hiking, and practicing mindfulness meditation. They are known for their kind and empathetic nature, always ready to lend a listening ear to friends in need. Sam also actively participates in community organizing efforts and advocates for inclusivity and diversity in all spaces.

Which is more probable?
(a) Sam is a gambling dealer.
(b) Sam is a gambling dealer and enjoys collecting and building model trains.
4.incorrect_answer: (b) Sam is a gambling dealer and enjoys collecting and building model trains

0.question:
